translated: Sidney Bechet, (New Orleans, 1897 - Garches, France, 1959) is an American musician, clarinet, soprano saxophonist and jazz composer.
original: Sidney Bechet, (La Nouvelle Orléans, 1897 - Garches, France, 1959) est un musicien américain, clarinettiste, saxophoniste soprano et compositeur de jazz.
